segments.text: I see the woman standing in front of the sink, drying a plate with such determination.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems completely oblivious to the water overflowing and the puddle expanding at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's almost as if she's in her own little world, focused solely on that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the sunlight filtering through the window, making the kitchen look warm and inviting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But then, I look down and see the water pooling and think, this could get messy really fast.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sounds of water splashing against the floor fill the silence around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I canâ€™t help but wonder how she can ignore all these signs of chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR
